text: The 2019 Giro di Sicilia was the twenty-fourth edition of the Giro di Sicilia, a men's multi-stage bicycle race. It was held between 3 and 6 June 2019 and was organised as a 2.1 event in the UCI Europe Tour. The general classification was won by Brandon McNulty (). == References == Category:2019 in Italian sport Category:2019 UCI Europe Tour Giro di Sicilia
title: 2019 Giro di Sicilia
